entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 08:12 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:12 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
